rule.condition: planned.start in $L.file~=planned.start in $L.file.save or planned.end in $L.file~=planned.end in $L.file.save
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: planned.start in $L.file~=planned.start in $L.file.save or planned.end in $L.file~=planned.end in $L.file.save)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"planned.start in $L.file~=planned.start in $L.file.save or planned.end in $L.file~=planned.end in $L.file.save"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send Notification: "CHM Plan and Schedule" (when ( Expression: planned.start in $L.file~=planned.start in $L.file.save or planned.end in $L.file~=planned.end in $L.file.save))
